name: GLITCH - The Ice Age
description:
This game looks like one of those free nock-off games, but it is way newer and better than that. This game took me 4-5 days to create. It is not part or for a GAMEJAM. The best part is, is that this game is on-going, never ending, looping kind of game! You can unlock characters and collect coins and power-ups! There will be updates to this game every week until the final version. 

I hope you enjoy playing my new game!
